verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> or Psalm <WH4210> of David. <WH1732> O god, <WH430> my heart <WH3820> is fixed; <WH3559> I will sing <WH7891> and give praise, <WH2167> even <WH637> with my glory. <WH3519>
Awake, <WH5782> psaltery <WH5035> and harp: <WH3658> I myself will awake <WH5782> early. <WH7837>
I will praise <WH3034> you, O LORD, <WH3068> among the people: <WH5971> and I will sing <WH2167> praises to you among the nations. <WH3816>
For your mercy <WH2617> is great <WH1419> above <WH5921> the heavens: <WH8064> and your truth <WH571> reaches to the clouds. <WH7834>
Be you exalted, <WH7311> O God, <WH430> above <WH5921> the heavens: <WH8064> and your glory <WH3519> above <WH5921> all the earth; <WH776>
That your beloved <WH3039> may be delivered: <WH2502> save <WH3467> with your right <WH3225> hand, <WH3225> and answer <WH6030> me.
God <WH430> has spoken <WH1696> in his holiness; <WH6944> I will rejoice, <WH5937> I will divide <WH2505> Shechem, <WH7927> and mete <WH4058> out the valley <WH6010> of Succoth. <WH5523>
Gilead <WH1568> is mine; Manasseh <WH4519> is mine; Ephraim <WH669> also is the strength <WH4581> of my head; <WH7218> Judah <WH3063> is my lawgiver; <WH2710>
Moab <WH4124> is my wash pot; <WH5518> <WH7366> over <WH5921> Edom <WH123> will I cast <WH7993> out my shoe; <WH5275> over Philistia <WH6429> will I triumph. <WH7321>
Who <WH4310> will bring <WH2986> me into the strong <WH4013> city? <WH5892> who <WH4310> will lead <WH5148> me into <WH5704> Edom? <WH123>
Will not you, O God, <WH430> who have cast <WH2186> us off? and will not you, O God, <WH430> go <WH3318> forth <WH3318> with our hosts? <WH6635>
Give <WH3051> us help <WH5833> from trouble: <WH6862> for vain <WH7723> is the help <WH8668> of man. <WH120>
Through God <WH430> we shall do <WH6213> valiantly: <WH2428> for he it is that shall tread <WH947> down our enemies. <WH6862>
